title: The Strangeling's Tale
description: A tale of magic and adventure, drawing seven very different people together in a quest to destroy a sphere of malevolent power. At the heart of the tale grows the Story Tree, with a mysterious prophecy written around its papery trunk. Seven adventurers find their paths converging on the tree and its mysterious inscription, each with their own reasons to uncover its message and complete the quest.
author: Carol Ferro
